abstract: Bank of New York Mellon and JPMorgan Chase have agreed to transfer about $535 million in the accounts of Bernard L. Madoff Investment Securities to the trustee liquidating the collapsed firm.
lead_paragraph: Bank of New York Mellon and JPMorgan Chase have agreed to transfer about $535 million in the accounts of Bernard L. Madoff Investment Securities to the trustee liquidating the collapsed firm.

headline.main: Madoff Trustee to Get $535 Million From 2 Banks
